


<!-- @namespace    sugar.node.auth -->
<!-- @name    bitbucketApiValidator -->

# ```js bitbucketApiValidator ```


Make sure the bitbucket api authentification has been made correctly

## Parameters

- **authInfo**  Object: The authentification info
